testcase.name: As a User I want to login to a website so that I can access my account
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Linkedin login page.......................................passed When I enter valid credentials..............................................passed And I Click on signin button................................................passed Then I should be logged in successfully.....................................passed

testcase.name: As a User I shouldn't be able to login If I enter wrong username
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Linkedin login page.......................................passed When I enter wrong username and correct password credentials...............passed And I Click on signin button................................................passed Then I should be able to see and validate the error message for the username field.passed

testcase.name: As a User I shouldn't be able to login If I enter wrong password
testcase.failure:
